text: Thanks a lot for your replies :pray:

Hi, You could try this. In your portal, click on parameters -> Domains and url -> URL redirects, and you create a new redirect (permanent) from <http://example.com/about|example.com/about> (your HubSpot website) to <http://example2.com/about|example2.com/about> (<http://example2.com|example2.com> is your wordpress website). You can also create two subdomains for your <http://example.com|example.com> domain: <http://wordpress.example.com|wordpress.example.com> and <http://HubSpot.example.com|HubSpot.example.com>, and put the HubSpot tracking code on your wordpress site: you will be able to navigate between the two websites and keeping HubSpot tools on the wordpress website. Your page "about" will be on <http://wordpress.example.com|wordpress.example.com> and the HubSpot pages on <http://HubSpot.example.com|HubSpot.example.com>. But you cannot have your HubSpot website on <http://example.com|example.com> *and* the wordpress one in the same domain *without a subdomain separation*.
Your question is too broad. What do you want to do exactly? Insert the external form data in HubSpot?
Just following up on my original post, if anyone have idea, I will highly appreciate the help.
Did you not find any solutions by googling this? Are you using the endpoint on frontend by any chance?
What do you need help with? <https://dontasktoask.com/|https://dontasktoask.com/>

Hello folks,

• using the HubSpot chat widget but every time I received a message - 
i got notification saying "Unknown visitor ...." on slack as it is connected to HubSpot account
• User is signed into my React SPA so using the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/api/conversations/visitor-identification#generate|Visitor Identification API>
• But still I get Unknown visitor
• I checked the logs on the HubSpot -> Private apps -> Logs : There I see api call (token generation) being successful but in that request I dont see header or data and I think that's the reason I'm seeing unknown visitor
I have added the screenshots below.
Any help is greatly appreciated
